name: The 15th International Conference on E-Learning and Games & Metaverse (Edutainment & Metaverse 2022)
content: Publication: Accepted excellent English papers of Edutainment 2022 after presentation at the conference will be published in conference proceedings and subsequently recommended for submission to the SCI journal IET Image Processing. Accepted excellent Chinese papers of Edutainment 2022 after presentation at the conference will be recommended to Journal of Nanjing University of Information Science, Technology and Packaging Engineering and Journal of System Simulation for publication.
